name: Double Time
description:
Double Time is a fun and energetic game suitable for any age group. The game is very dynamic; it trains your reactions and contains useful exercises for training your eye muscles. Did you know it? there are muscles everywhere.



Characteristics of the game: you will be given a certain amount of time. Every time you hit the coins with the ball, you will be given 5 additional seconds. The more you hit the target, the more chances you have to beat the record, collecting 55 coins



However, it is all not so easy. You will have enemies, that will try to sabotage you by shooting at you. You will need to resist them, keeping the time in mind!
